item.title: The AI Data Center Boom Is Warping the US Economy
item.description: Microsoft, Alphabet, Meta, and Amazon are investing tens of billions in data centers. AI infrastructure is now a key driver of US economic growth.

item.title: The Pixel 10 Family Is Marked Down on Amazon
item.description: You can snag a discount on all the Pixel 10 phone varieties if you act fast.

item.title: Meet the Chinese Startup Using AI—and a Small Army of Workers—to Train Robots
item.description: AgiBot is using AI-powered robots to do new manufacturing tasks. Smarter machines may transform physical labor in China.

item.title: Zohran Mamdani’s Campaign Figured Out How to Channel Fandom
item.description: Much of the content about Mamdani online hasn’t come from his campaign or the dozens of political influencers invited to cover it. It has also come fr...

item.title: Zohran Mamdani Just Inherited the NYPD Surveillance State
item.description: In addition to affordability, New York City’s mayor-elect will be forced to reckon with the NYPD’s sweeping mass surveillance operations.
